data.lyric:
[ti:One That Got Away]
[ar:Michael Ray]
[al:Amos]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]One That Got Away - Michael Ray
[00:01.19]Lyrics by：Josh Osborne/Matt Ramsey/Josh Rosen/Jesse Frasure
[00:02.38]Yeah yeah yeah
[00:06.23]
[00:08.63]Yeah yeah yeah
[00:12.72]She's like a picture from an airplane window
[00:15.69]It's always sunny up above the clouds
[00:18.05]
[00:18.69]She's got a mouth full of innuendo
[00:21.41]But she makes it sound innocent somehow
[00:23.85]
[00:24.46]Those hungry eyes can't eat the night
[00:27.33]Take me to church show me the light
[00:30.38]Straight masterpiece way out of my league
[00:33.29]Yeah but I'm gonna hold her like a trophy tonight
[00:36.02]
[00:36.63]She's decoratin' my car
[00:39.70]Soon she'll be breakin' my heart
[00:42.60]She's too Wild Horses to be all mine
[00:45.30]I'll be your Beast of Burden on Borrowed Time
[00:48.01]
[00:48.68]She's gonna rip off ay kind of label
[00:51.65]She's into leavin' those strings untied
[00:54.14]
[00:54.69]Keepin' it tax free under the table
[00:57.68]She might only be mine tonight
[00:59.93]
[01:00.66]But that's alright that's okay
[01:03.29]She's gonna be one hell of a one that got away
[01:06.84]That's alright might hurt but hey
[01:09.25]She's gonna be one hell of a one that got away
[01:12.49]
[01:14.64]Yeah yeah yeah
[01:18.08]
[01:20.73]Yeah yeah yeah
[01:24.19]
[01:24.91]I ain't gonna sit here and overthink it
[01:27.64]I got a tiger by the tail
[01:30.72]I'll just smile when she sinks her teeth in
[01:33.72]She'll leave a scar and a story to tell
[01:36.02]
[01:36.64]She's decoratin' my car
[01:39.70]Soon she'll be breakin' my heart
[01:42.62]She's too Wild Horses to be all mine
[01:45.31]I'll be your Beast of Burden on Borrowed Time

[01:57.68]She might only be mine tonight
[02:00.03]

[02:06.73]That's alright might hurt but hey
[02:09.23]She's gonna be one hell of a one that got away
[02:12.78]

[02:27.95]
